title: Lahanosalata (Greek Cabbage Salad)
ingredients: 2 tablespoons olive oil, or more to taste
1 1/2 tablespoons red wine vinegar, or more to taste
salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
method: Step 1: Combine cabbage, carrots, olive oil, vinegar, salt, and pepper in a bowl; toss well. Taste and add up to 2 tablespoons more olive oil and 1 1/2 tablespoons more vinegar as desired.
Step 2: Serve immediately or chill until ready to serve.
